trans-unit.source: Signing in for the first time with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Signing in for the first time with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page describes what the user experience will be the first time they signin.
trans-unit.target: This page describes what the user experience will be the first time they signin.

trans-unit.source: Setup experience for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Setup experience for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: Additional security verification settings are used when an admin has configured your account to require that both your password and a response from your phone must be used to verify your identity.
trans-unit.target: Additional security verification settings are used when an admin has configured your account to require that both your password and a response from your phone must be used to verify your identity.

trans-unit.source: If an administrator has configured your account to require additional security verification, **you will be unable to sign-in until you have completed the auto-enrollment process**.
trans-unit.target: If an administrator has configured your account to require additional security verification, **you will be unable to sign-in until you have completed the auto-enrollment process**.

trans-unit.source: Determine how you will use multi-factor authentication
trans-unit.target: Determine how you will use multi-factor authentication

trans-unit.source: The first time that you sign in after your account has been configured, you will be prompted to begin the auto-enrollment process.
trans-unit.target: The first time that you sign in after your account has been configured, you will be prompted to begin the auto-enrollment process.

trans-unit.source: You can begin this process by clicking **Set it up now.**
trans-unit.target: You can begin this process by clicking **Set it up now.**

trans-unit.source: Setup
trans-unit.target: Setup

trans-unit.source: Using the enrollment process you will be able to specify your preferred method of verification.
trans-unit.target: Using the enrollment process you will be able to specify your preferred method of verification.

trans-unit.source: This can be any of the following in the table below.
trans-unit.target: This can be any of the following in the table below.

trans-unit.source: For additional information including a walk-through simply click on one of the methods.
trans-unit.target: For additional information including a walk-through simply click on one of the methods.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Mobile Phone Call
trans-unit.target: Mobile Phone Call

trans-unit.source: Places an automated voice call to the Authentication phone.
trans-unit.target: Places an automated voice call to the Authentication phone.

trans-unit.source: The user answers the call and presses # in the phone keypad to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: The user answers the call and presses # in the phone keypad to authenticate.

trans-unit.source: This phone number will not be synchronized to on-premises Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This phone number will not be synchronized to on-premises Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Phone Text Message
trans-unit.target: Mobile Phone Text Message

trans-unit.source: Sends a text message containing a verification code to the user.
trans-unit.target: Sends a text message containing a verification code to the user.

trans-unit.source: The user is prompted to either reply to the text message with the verification code or to enter the verification code into the sign-in interface.
trans-unit.target: The user is prompted to either reply to the text message with the verification code or to enter the verification code into the sign-in interface.

trans-unit.source: Office Phone Call
trans-unit.target: Office Phone Call

trans-unit.source: Places an automated voice call to the user.
trans-unit.target: Places an automated voice call to the user.

trans-unit.source: The user answers the call and presses # in the phone keypad to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: The user answers the call and presses # in the phone keypad to authenticate.

trans-unit.source: Mobile app
trans-unit.target: Mobile app

trans-unit.source: Pushes a notification to the Multi-Factor mobile app on the user’s smartphone or tablet.
trans-unit.target: Pushes a notification to the Multi-Factor mobile app on the user’s smartphone or tablet.

trans-unit.source: The user taps “Verify” in the app to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: The user taps “Verify” in the app to authenticate.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, the app can also be used as an OTP token for offline authentication.
trans-unit.target: Alternately, the app can also be used as an OTP token for offline authentication.

trans-unit.source: The user enters the token into the sign-in screen to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: The user enters the token into the sign-in screen to authenticate.

trans-unit.source: The Multi-Factor Authentication app can operate in 2 different modes to provide the additional security that a multi-factor authentication service can provide.
trans-unit.target: The Multi-Factor Authentication app can operate in 2 different modes to provide the additional security that a multi-factor authentication service can provide.

trans-unit.source: These are the following:
trans-unit.target: These are the following:

trans-unit.source: **Notification** - In this mode, the Multi-Factor Authentication app prevents unauthorized access to accounts and stops fraudulent transactions.
trans-unit.target: **Notification** - In this mode, the Multi-Factor Authentication app prevents unauthorized access to accounts and stops fraudulent transactions.

trans-unit.source: This is done using a push notification to your phone or registered device.
trans-unit.target: This is done using a push notification to your phone or registered device.

trans-unit.source: Simply view the notification and if it is legitimate select Authenticate.
trans-unit.target: Simply view the notification and if it is legitimate select Authenticate.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise you may choose Deny or choose to deny and report the fraudulent notification.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise you may choose Deny or choose to deny and report the fraudulent notification.

trans-unit.source: For information on reporting fraudulent notifications see How to use the Deny and Report Fraud Feature for Multi-Factor Authentication.
trans-unit.target: For information on reporting fraudulent notifications see How to use the Deny and Report Fraud Feature for Multi-Factor Authentication.

trans-unit.source: **One-Time Password** - In this mode, the Multi-Factor Authentication app can be used as a software token to generate an OATH verification code.
trans-unit.target: **One-Time Password** - In this mode, the Multi-Factor Authentication app can be used as a software token to generate an OATH verification code.

trans-unit.source: This verification code can then be entered along with the username and password to provide the second form of authentication.
trans-unit.target: This verification code can then be entered along with the username and password to provide the second form of authentication.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Authenticator app is available for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458).
trans-unit.target: The Azure Authenticator app is available for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458).
